products.name: Artificer General Nemo & Storm Chaser Adept Caitlin Finch

characterabilities.name: Requisition [Supernal Coalition]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit can be included in a Supernal Coalition army as if it were in that faction.

characterabilities.name: Strange Bedfellows
characterabilities.description: When included in a Supernal Coalition army, this model can include cohort models in its battlegroup that share a primary faction identity as this model. Jack Marshals may be assigned Cohort models from their primary faction identity.

feat.name: Eye of the Storm
feat.description: When a friendly Faction model makes an electrical damage roll against an enemy model in Nemo's Control range, add an additional die to the damage roll. Eye of the Storm lasts for one turn.

execution.name: EMF Mechanics
execution.description: This model gains Blast Resistance.

ability.name: Lightning Generator
ability.description: When a model is directly hit with a basic attack made with this weapon, lightning arcs from the model hit to d3 consecutive additional models unless that model has Resistance: Electric. The lightning arcs to the nearest model it has not already arced to within 4" of the last model it arced to ignoring this model and models with Resistance: Electric. Each model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 Electric damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that cause the lighting to arc.

spells.name: Chain Lightning
spells.description: A model hit by Chain Lightning suffers a POW 10 electrical damage roll, and lightning arcs from the model hit to d3 consecutive additional models unless that model has resistance: electricity. The lightning arcs to the nearest model it has not already arced to within 4" of the last model it arced to ignoring models with resistance: electricity ignoring this model. Each model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 electrical damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Chain Lightning damage rolls are simultaneous.

spells.name: Electrify
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 ARM and Repulsor Field. Models are not affected while out of formation. (When a model with Repulsor Field is hit with a melee attack, after the attack is resolved the attacking model is pushed 1" directly away from the model hit.).

spells.name: Force Hammer
spells.description: Instead of suffering a normal damage roll, a non-Incorporeal model Force Hammer hits is slammed d6" directly away from the spell's point of origin and suffers a POW 12 damage roll. Collateral damage from this slam is POW 12.

spells.name: Lightning Shroud
spells.description: Target warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2 to Melee Damage rolls and Resistance: Electricity, and its melee weapons gain Electro Leap. (When a model is hit by a basic attack made with a weapon with Electro Leap, you can have lightning arc to the nearest model within 4" of the model hit, ignoring the attacking model and any model with Resistance: electricity. The model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 electrical damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that caused the leap.).

spells.name: Magnetic Field
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, models in its battlegroup cannot become knocked down, cannot be warped or pushed, and cannot be moved by a slam.

characterabilities.name: Attached
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game, attach this model to a friendly Faction leader for the rest of the game. Each Leader can have only one model/unit attached to it. The attached model is part of its Leader's Battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Companion [Nemo 3]
characterabilities.description: This model is included in any army that includes Nemo 3. If Nemo 3 is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Nemo 3's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Fine Tuning
characterabilities.description: While this model is in formation, Nemo can upkeep one spell without spending focus.

characterabilities.name: Power Booster
characterabilities.description: When Nemo allocates 1 or more focus to a warjack in this model's CMD range, the warjack generates 1 additional focus point.

characterabilities.name: Conflicted Heart
characterabilities.description: If this model is not in a Trollbloods army, and makes a roll against a Trollkin model, it rolls one fewer die.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Cygnar, Llael, Ord]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Cygnar, Llael, Ord.

feat.name: Bombing Run
feat.description: Gunnbjorn and friendly Faction models beginning their activation in his Control range gain Reposition [3”] and their ranged weapons gain Full Force. Bombing Run lasts for one turn. (The POW of blast damage caused by a weapon with Full Force is equal to the POW of the weapon.)

execution.name: Commando Training
execution.description: This model gains Pathfinder.

topability.name: Battle Plan
topability.description: This model can use one of the following plans at any time during its activation. A friendly Faction model/unit can be affected by only one plan each turn.

subabilities.name: Bring it Down
subabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly non-leader warrior model. If the model is in range, it immediately makes one basic ranged attack. During this attack, the model gains boosted ranged accuracy and damage rolls.

subabilities.name: Relay Coordinates
subabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly unit. If the unit is in range, models in the unit gain Hunter. Relay Coordinates lasts for one turn.

subabilities.name: Unload!
subabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly Warbeast. If the Warbeast is in rage, its ranged weapons gain +1 ROF. Unload! Lasts for one turn.

ability.name: Armor-Piercing
ability.description: When calculating damage from this weapon, halve the base ARM stats of the models hit.

ability.name: Thunderbolt
ability.description: Enemy models hit are pushed d3" directly away from the attacking model. On a critical hit, the enemy model becomes knocked down after being pushed.

spells.name: Explosivo
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model's ranged weapons gain Damage Type: Arcane. If the affected model directly hits and boxes an enemy model with an attack from a ranged weapon, center a 3" AOE on the boxed model, then remove that model from play. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer an unboostable POW 10 magical blast damage roll.

spells.name: Expose
spells.description: Place a 5” AOE completely within the spellcaster's Control range. While within the AOE, enemy models lose and cannot gain Stealth or Shield Guard and do not gain bonuses from spells, including animi, that add to their ARM or DEF.

spells.name: Foxhole
spells.description: Place a 5" AOE anywhere completely within the spellcaster's Control Range where it does not touch a model's base, an obstruction or an obstacle. Models completely within the AOE have cover and do not suffer blast damage. When drawing LOS to the model not completely within the AOE, ignore intervening models completely within the AOE.

spells.name: Relentless Barrage
spells.description: Target warbeast in this model's battlegroup that is in its Control range can immediately make one basic melee or ranged attack. A model can be targeted by Relentless Barrage only once per turn.

characterabilities.name: Acrobatics
characterabilities.description: This model can advance through other models if it has enough movement to move completely past their bases. This model ignores intervening models when declaring its charge target.

characterabilities.name: Dodge
characterabilities.description: This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

characterabilities.name: Flames in the Darkness
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in a Religion of the Twins army. If it is, it becomes a Religion of the Twins model and not a [Cygnar] model. If included in a Religion of the Twins army, you may include up to 2 Cygnar or Khador Non-Character warjacks in this model's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Sprint
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it destroyed or removed from play one or more enemy models with melee attacks, this model can immediately make a full advance, then it's activation ends.

feat.name: Powerhouse
feat.description: While in Jakes' Control range, friendly Faction warjacks gains +2 to melee accuracy and melee damage rolls. While within 3" of the affected warjack, friendly Faction non-warjack models gain +2 on melee accuracy and melee damage rolls. Powerhouse lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Medallion of Ascendant Rowan
execution.description: The first time each turn this model would be the target of an enemy spell or upkeep, increase the cost of that spell or upkeep by 1.

ability.name: Reload [1]
ability.description: This model can spend up to 1 focus, fury, or essensce to make one additional ranged attack with this weapon during its Combat Action per focus, fury, or essence spent.

ability.name: Feedback
ability.description: If this weapon damages a warjack that is part of a battlegroup, the warjack's controller suffers 1 damage point.

ability.name: Electro Leap
ability.description: When a model is hit by a basic attack made with this weapon, you can have lightning arc to the nearest model within 4" of the model hit, ignoring the attacking model and any model with Resistance: Electric. The model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 Electric damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that caused the leap.

spells.name: Bulwark
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, and B2B with one or more models in its battlegroup, models in the spellcaster's battlegroup gain +2 DEF and cannot become knocked down.

spells.name: Dash
spells.description: The spellcaster and friendly Faction warrior models activating in its Control Range gain +1 SPD. While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly Faction warrior models gain Unstoppable. Dash lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Electrical Blast
spells.description: Electrical Blast causes electrical damage. Warjacks damaged by Electrical Blast suffer Disruption.

spells.name: Lightning Tendrils
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Resistance: Electricity. Affected models' melee weapons become RNG 2 and gain Electro Leap. Models are not affected while out of formation.

characterabilities.name: Chain Attack [Spellstorm Pistol] [Grievous Wounds]
characterabilities.description: If this model hits the same model with two Spellstorm Pistol attacks, after resolving the attacks it can immediately Grievous Wounds. (A model hit by this weapon loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.)

characterabilities.name: True Sight
characterabilities.description: This model ignores cloud effects when determining LOS. This model also ignores Stealth.

feat.name: Overkill
feat.description: After resolving each ranged attack that hits an enemy model, Captain Allister Caine gains a cumulative +1 to his Spellstorm Pistol attack damage rolls. When a model is boxed by a Spellstorm Pistol attack, center a 3" AOE on it and remove it from play. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer an unboostable POW 10 blast damage roll. Overkill expires at the end of Caine's activation.

execution.name: Prowl
execution.description: While this model has concealment, it gains Stealth.

ability.name: Reload [Infinite]
ability.description: This model can spend up to Infinite focus, fury, or essensce to make one additional ranged attack with this weapon during its Combat Action per focus, fury, or essence spent.

ability.name: Trick Shot [Initial Attack Only]
ability.description: If this attack directly hits, choose another model within 4" of the model hit. The chosen model suffers an unboostable POW 10 Arcane damage roll. The point of origin for this damage is the model hit. Trick Shot damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Black Penny
subabilities.description: This attack ignores the target in melee DEF bonus.

subabilities.name: Heart Seeker
subabilities.description: Gain an additional die on damage rolls resulting from this attack. Discard the lowest die in each roll.

subabilities.name: Ward Breaker
subabilities.description: When resolving this attack, this weapon gains Blessed.

spells.name: Bullet Dodger
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model gains +2 DEF and Dodge. (A model with Dodge can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.).

spells.name: Fire For Effect
spells.description: Boost the attack and damage rolls of target friendly Faction model's first ranged attack each activation.

spells.name: Gate Crasher
spells.description: Warp the spellcaster anywhere completely within 5" of its current location. After casting Gate Crasher, for the rest of this activation the spellcaster cannot advance and its ranged attacks must target models in its melee range. Gate Crasher can be cast only once per activation.

spells.name: Heighten Reflexes
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit cannot become knocked down or stationary. Models are not affected while out of formation.

characterabilities.name: Defense Formation
characterabilities.description: Models in this model's battlegroup that are currently in this model's Control range and are B2B with one or more models in this model's battlegroup gain +2 ARM and cannot become knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Polarity Field
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by a charge or slam power attack made by a model beginning the charge or slam in it's front arc.

characterabilities.name: Spell Rack [2]
characterabilities.description: During list construction this model may select a number of spells from its faction spell pool according to its designated spell rack number. This model gains these spells in addition to the spells that are already on its card. A model may not have two identical spells on its spell card. When making spell selections from the spell pool deduct the spells COST from this model's available Battlegroup Points unless the spell entry lists another cost.

characterabilities.name: Split Loyalties [Ord] [Cygnar]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Ord army, DiBaro 1 is a Ord model and not a Cygnar model. When included in a Cygnar army, DiBaro 1 is a Cygnar model and not a Ord model.

feat.name: Weathering the Storm
feat.description: While in Captain Athena di Baro's Control range, models gain one additional dice on their accuracy rolls and damage rolls. When resolving a friendly model's roll. Discard the lowest die rolled. When resolving an enemy model's roll, discard the highest die rolled. Weathering the Storm lasts for one round.

execution.name: Groundwork
execution.description: While knocked down, this model is not automatically hit by melee attacks and its DEF is not reduced by being knocked down.

ability.name: Critical Cortex Damage
ability.description: On a critical hit on a warjack, the warjack suffers 1 damage point to its first available cortex system box.

spells.name: Hallowed Avenger
spells.description: Target friendly Faction Cohort model gains Righteous Vengeance. (If one or more friendly Faction warrior models were destroyed or removed from play by enemy attacks while within 5" of a model with Righteous Vengeance during the last round, during your Maintenance Phase the model with Righteous Vengeance can advance up to 3" and make one basic attack.).

spells.name: Open Fire
spells.description: Target Cohort model in this model's battlegroup that is in its Control Range can immediately make one basic ranged attack. A model can be targeted by open fire only once per turn.

characterabilities.name: Activate Halfjack
characterabilities.description: At the end of your Control Phase, you can put one Halfjack Solo into play within 1" of this model if there are fewer than three Halfjacks in play in Darius' battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Crane
characterabilities.description: Once per turn at any time during its activation, this model can choose one other friendly large-based or smaller model within 2" of it. You can place that model anywhere completely within 2" of its current location, and if it is knocked down, it immediately stands up.

characterabilities.name: Repair [d3+3] (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG 1". Target friendly Faction construct model. If the model is in range, remove d3+3 damage point from it.

characterabilities.name: Repairable
characterabilities.description: This model can be targeted with Repair special actions as if it were a construct model.

feat.name: Pitstop
feat.description: Captain E. Dominic Darious gains 3 focus points, then remove all damage from friendly warjacks within 1' of Darius or a Halfjack in his battlegroup. Additionally, warjacks currently within 1" of Darius or a Halfjack in his battlegroup gain +2 SPD, MAT and RAT for one turn.

execution.name: Field Marshal [Dodge]
execution.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Dodge. (A model with Dodge can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.)

ability.name: Steam Pressure
ability.description: If this model uses it's Normal Movement to aim, this weapon gains +4 RNG that activation.

ability.name: Critical Knockdown
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes knocked down.

ability.name: Tremor (★Attack)
ability.description: This attack causes no damage. Other models within 2" of this model become knocked down. This model is not affected by Tremor.

spells.name: Arcantrik Bolt
spells.description: A warjack damaged by this attack becomes stationary for one round.

spells.name: Fortify
spells.description: Target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2 ARM. That model and any friendly model B2B with it cannot become knocked down, be pushed, or moved by a slam.

spells.name: Full Throttle
spells.description: Warjacks in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range can run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks without spending focus that activation. While in the spellcaster's Control Range, models in its battlegroup gain boosted melee attack rolls. Full Throttle lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Jackhammer
spells.description: Target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup immediately makes one basic melee attack.

spells.name: Refuge
spells.description: At the end of an activation in which target friendly Faction model hit an enemy model with an attack, the affected model can make a full advance.

characterabilities.name: Companion [Captain E. Dominic Darius]
characterabilities.description: This model is included in any army that includes Captain E. Dominic Darius. If Captain E. Dominic Darius is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Captain E. Dominic Darius's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Prime Mine (★Action)
characterabilities.description: Replace this model with a small based mine marker. You can have up to three mine markers in play at any time. After resolving continuous effects during your Maintenance Phase, you can detonate any number of friendly mine markers. Models within 3" of a mine marker suffer an unboostable POW 14 blast damage roll, then the mine marker is removed from the table. The mine marker is not a model.

characterabilities.name: Repair [1] (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG 1". Target friendly Faction construct model. If the model is in range, remove 1 damage point from it.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Kill Shot] [Gunfighter]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Kill Shot. (Once per activation, when an enemy model is destroyed or removed from play as a result of a melee attack made by this model during its activation, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can make one basic ranged attack.)

characterabilities.name: Resourceful
characterabilities.description: This model can upkeep spells on models in it's battlegroup without spending focus or fury.

characterabilities.name: Split Loyalties [Cygnar] [Trollbloods]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Cygnar army, Gunnbjorn 1 is a Cygnar model and not a Trollbloods model. When included in a Trollbloods army, Gunnbjorn 1 is a Trollbloods model and not a Cygnar model.

feat.name: Fortification
feat.description: While in Gunnbjorn’s Control range, friendly Faction models gain cover, do not suffer damage from ranged attacks, and cannot become knocked down. Fortification lasts for one round.

execution.name: Girded
execution.description: This model and models B2B with it gain Resistance: Blast.

ability.name: Critical Devastation
ability.description: On a critical hit, models hit are thrown d6" directly away from the attacker. Roll distance once for all models affected. Move models farthest from the attacker first. Instead of suffering blast damage, models hit but not directly hit suffer a damage roll with POW of collateral damage is equal to the blast damage POW of this weapon.

spells.name: Explosivo
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model's ranged weapons gain Damage Type: Arcane. If the affected model directly hits and boxes an enemy model with an attack from a ranged weapon, center a 3" AOE on the boxed model, then remove that model from play. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer an unboostable POW 10 magical blast damage roll.

spells.name: Guided Fire
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, models in its battlegroup gain boosted Ranged Accuracy rolls for one turn.

spells.name: Rock Wall
spells.description: Place a wall template anywhere completely within the spellcaster's Control Range where it does not touch a model's base, an obstruction, or an obstacle. The wall is an obstacle that provides cover.

spells.name: Sentry
spells.description: Target friendly Faction gains Rapid Fire. (A model with Rapid Fire can make one basic ranged attack during your Maintenance Phase.).

spells.name: Snipe
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model's/unit's non spray ranged weapons gain +4 RNG.

characterabilities.name: Iron Horse
characterabilities.description: Light and heavy warjacks in this model's battlegroup gain Cavalry, Pathfinder and Reposition [5"]. When an affected warjack makes an impact attack, that attack has a base POW equal to its STR. The melee range of impact attacks is 1". Affected warjacks do not gain Mount attacks from Iron Horse.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [5"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 5", then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

feat.name: Shadow War
feat.description: When one or more enemy models are destroyed by an attack while in Kraye's Control range, immediately after the attack is resolved, one model in Kraye's battlegroup currently in it's Control range gains 1 focus point. Additionally, while in Kraye's Control range, models in his battlegroup gain Stealth. Shadow war lasts for one round.

execution.name: Leadership [Rangers] [Beacon, Flare]
execution.description: While in this model's CMD range, friendly faction Rangers gain Beacon and Flare. (Friendly Faction models can charge or make a slam power attack against an enemy model hit by a weapon with Beacon without being forced or spending focus. A friendly Faction model charging an enemy model hit by Beacon gains +2" movement. Beacon lasts for one turn.) (Models hit by an attack with Flare lose Stealth and cannot gain Stealth and suffer -2 DEF for one round.)

ability.name: Brutal Charge
ability.description: This model gains +2 to charge attack damage rolls with this weapon.

spells.name: Admonition
spells.description: When an enemy model advances and ends its movement or is warped within 6" of target model in this spellcaster's battlegroup, the affected model can immediately advance up to 3", then Admonition expires.

spells.name: Countermeasure
spells.description: While within 5" of target friendly Faction model/unit, enemy models cannot make ranged attacks.

spells.name: Horsepower
spells.description: Warjacks in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range gain +3" movement when they charge or make a slam power attack. Horsepower lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Jumpstart
spells.description: Models in the spellcaster's battlegroup that are currently in its Control Range stand up and are no longer stationary. Affected models can turn to face any direction. Models that were knocked down this turn are not affected by Jumpstart.

spells.name: Lock The Target
spells.description: A model damaged by Lock the Target cannot run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks for one round.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [True Sight]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain True Sight. (A model with True Sight ignores cloud effects when determining LOS. This model also ignores Stealth.)

characterabilities.name: Heart of Darkness [Cygnar]
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in an Infernals army. If it is, it becomes an Infernal model and not a Cygnar model. If included in an Infernals army, any non-partisan, non-character Cygnar Cohort can also be included in this model's battlegroup and they gain Accumulator [Soulless]. Additionally, you may include 2 non-partisan, non-character Cygnar units and 3 non-partisan, non-Archon, non-character Cygnar Solos as well.

characterabilities.name: True Sight
characterabilities.description: This model ignores cloud effects when determining LOS. This model also ignores Stealth.

feat.name: Firing Squad
feat.description: Friendly Faction models gain boosted Ranged Accuracy rolls while in this models Control range, additionally models in this model's battlegroup can make one additional ranged attack during their activations regardless of their ROF. Firing Squad lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Dual Shot
execution.description: If this model uses its Normal Movement to aim, it can make one additional ranged attack this activation.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Black Penny
subabilities.description: This attack ignores the target in melee DEF bonus.

subabilities.name: Thunderbolt
subabilities.description: Enemy models hit are pushed d3" directly away from the attacking model. On a critical hit, the enemy model becomes knocked down after being pushed.

subabilities.name: Ward Breaker
subabilities.description: When resolving this attack, this weapon gains Blessed.

spells.name: Deadeye
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains an additional die on each model's first non-spray tanged attack roll this turn.

spells.name: Dust To Dust
spells.description: When an enemy warrior model is boxed by Dust to Dust, center a 3" AOE cloud effect on it, then remove the model from play. The AOE remains in play for one round.

spells.name: Fire Group
spells.description: While models in the spellcaster's battlegroup are in its Control Range, their ranged weapons gain +2 RNG. Fire Group lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Refuge
spells.description: At the end of an activation in which target friendly Faction model hit an enemy model with an attack, the affected model can make a full advance.

spells.name: Return Fire
spells.description: When target friendly Faction model is targeted by an enemy ranged attack, after the attack is resolved the affected model can make one basic melee or ranged attack, then Return fire expires. Return Fire lasts for one Round.

characterabilities.name: Bird's Eye
characterabilities.description: While in this model's Control Range, models in its battlegroup can ignore cloud effects, forest terrain, and intervening models when determining LOS.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [3"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Spell Rack [3]
characterabilities.description: During list construction this model may select a number of spells from its faction spell pool according to its designated spell rack number. This model gains these spells in addition to the spells that are already on its card. A model may not have two identical spells on its spell card. When making spell selections from the spell pool deduct the spells COST from this model's available Battlegroup Points unless the spell entry lists another cost.

feat.name: Ride the Storm
feat.description: While in Calder's Control range, models in her battlegroup gain +3 DEF, Dodge and Riposte. Ride The Storm lasts for one round. (When a model with Riposte is missed by an enemy melee attack, immediately after the attack is resolved the model with Riposte can make one basic melee attack against the attacking model.)

execution.name: Veteran Leader [Cavalry]
execution.description: While in this model's CMD range, Cavalry models gain +1 to attack accuracy rolls.

ability.name: Brutal Charge
ability.description: This model gains +2 to charge attack damage rolls with this weapon.

ability.name: Critical Cortex Damage
ability.description: On a critical hit on a warjack, the warjack suffers 1 damage point to its first available cortex system box.

spells.name: Rhythm Of War
spells.description: Warjacks in this model's battlegroup that are in its Control Range can advance up to 3" after all friendly models have ended their activations on your turn.

spells.name: Watcher
spells.description: Once per turn when an enemy model advances and ends its movement within 6" of the spellcaster, you can choose a Cohort model in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range. That Cohort model can immediately make a full advance toward the enemy model and then can make one basic attack targeting the enemy model.

characterabilities.name: Battle Configuration
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game and at the start of each of your Maintenance Phases after your first turn, choose a configuration for this model to take: [Sky Stormer] or [Ground Assault]. Use that configuration's stats and rules for one round.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Reposition [3"]]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Reposition [3"]. (At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, a model with Reposition 3" can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.)

characterabilities.name: Flying High
characterabilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

characterabilities.name: Repairable
characterabilities.description: This model can be targeted with Repair special actions as if it were a construct model.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [3"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Requisition [Supernal Coalition]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit can be included in a Supernal Coalition army as if it were in that faction.

characterabilities.name: Spell Rack [2]
characterabilities.description: During list construction this model may select a number of spells from its faction spell pool according to its designated spell rack number. This model gains these spells in addition to the spells that are already on its card. A model may not have two identical spells on its spell card. When making spell selections from the spell pool deduct the spells COST from this model's available Battlegroup Points unless the spell entry lists another cost.

characterabilities.name: Strange Bedfellows
characterabilities.description: When included in a Supernal Coalition army, this model can include cohort models in its battlegroup that share a primary faction identity as this model. Jack Marshals may be assigned Cohort models from their primary faction identity.

feat.name: Initiate Full Auxiliary Power
feat.description: Huxley gains up to 6 focus points. He cannot have more focus points than his current ARC as a result of Initiate Full Auxiliary Power. Huxley can then immediately allocate focus points to warjacks in his battlegroup.

ability.name: Armor-Piercing
ability.description: When calculating damage from this weapon, halve the base ARM stats of the models hit.

ability.name: Beat Back
ability.description: Immediately after a basic attack with a weapon with Beat Back is resolved during this model's Combat Action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1" directly toward it.

spells.name: Fail-Safe
spells.description: Target warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2 ARM and does not suffer the effects of crippled systems.

spells.name: Full Throttle
spells.description: Warjacks in the spellcaster's battlegroup beginning their activations in its Control Range can run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks without spending focus that activation. While in the spellcaster's Control Range, models in its battlegroup gain boosted melee attack rolls. Full Throttle lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Ground Zero
spells.description: Center a 5" AOE on the spellcaster. Each other model in the AOE is hit and suffers a POW 13 damage roll. Immediately after this damage is resolved each enemy model damage by Ground Zero is pushed d6" directly away from the spellcaster in the order you choose.

characterabilities.name: Arcane Precision
characterabilities.description: If this model uses its Normal Movement to aim, it ignores Stealth that activation.

characterabilities.name: Battle Configuration

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Pathfinder]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Pathfinder. (a model with Pathfinder ignores the movement penalty of Rough [Forest] and Rough [Rubble] terrain while advancing.)

characterabilities.name: Repairable
characterabilities.description: This model can be targeted with Repair special actions as if it were a construct model.

characterabilities.name: Requisition [Supernal Coalition]

characterabilities.name: Spell Rack [2]
characterabilities.description: During list construction this model may select a number of spells from its faction spell pool according to its designated spell rack number. This model gains these spells in addition to the spells that are already on its card. A model may not have two identical spells on its spell card. When making spell selections from the spell pool deduct the spells COST from this model's available Battlegroup Points unless the spell entry lists another cost.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Strange Bedfellows

characterabilities.name: Sturdy

Chain Lightning damage rolls are simultaneous.

This model cannot use Rocket Pack during an activation in which it charges. During an activation in which this model was warped as a result of using the Rocket Pack ability, the damage roll for its next melee attack is automatically boosted.

feat.name: Perfect Position
feat.description: Small and medium-based friendly Faction warrior models currently in Colonel Markus Brisbane's Control range can immediately advance up to 3" and then gain Dig In. Warjacks in Brisbane's battlegroup currently in his Control range gain Bulldoze for one turn. (A model with Dig In gains cover, gains Resistance: Blast, and does not block LOS. The model remains dug in until it moves, is warped, or is engaged.) (When a model with Bulldoze is B2B with an enemy model during its Normal Movement, it can push that model up to 2" directly away from it. A model can be pushed by Bulldoze only once per turn. Bulldoze has no effect when a model makes a trample power attack.)

execution.name: Commando Training

ability.name: Ram

spells.name: High Ground

While completely within the AOE models gain Elevation and are always considered the highest Elevation when determining LOS. (A model with Elevation gains +2 DEF against Ranged and Magic Attacks, and their ranged weapons gain Arcing Fire.) (A model with Arcing Fire can ignore intervening models except those within 1" of the target.).

characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Arcane Ammunition. (The ranged weapons of models in this model's battlegroup gain Damage Type: Arcane.)

characterabilities.name: Range Amplifier
characterabilities.description: When this model casts a spell and is the point of origin for the spell, the spell gains +5 RNG.

characterabilities.name: True Sight
characterabilities.description: This model ignores cloud effects when determining LOS. This model also ignores Stealth.

feat.name: Maelstorm
feat.description: Caine can make a basic Spellstorm Pistol attack against every enemy model currently in his Control range, ignoring intervening models. When resolving Maelstrom, Cain can target models in his back arc. Caine cannot use Maelstrom while he is in melee. Maelstrom attacks are simultaneous.

execution.name: Apparition
execution.description: During your Control Phase, warp this model anywhere completely within 2" of its current location.

ability.name: Reload [1]
ability.description: This model can spend up to 1 focus, fury, or essensce to make one additional ranged attack with this weapon during its Combat Action per focus, fury, or essence spent.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Black Penny
subabilities.description: This attack ignores the target in melee DEF bonus.

subabilities.name: Psychomorphic Destabilizer
subabilities.description: This attack causes magical damage . Models hit by this attack lose incorporeal for one round.

subabilities.name: Shadow Fire
subabilities.description: A model hit by this attack does not block LOS for one turn.

spells.name: Blur
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +3 DEF against ranged and magic attack rolls. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spells.name: Deadeye
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains an additional die on each model's first non-spray tanged attack roll this turn.

spells.name: Snipe
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model's/unit's non spray ranged weapons gain +4 RNG.

spells.name: Teleport
spells.description: Warp the spellcaster anywhere completely within 6" of its current location, then its activation ends.

spells.name: Thunder Strike
spells.description: Instead of suffering a normal damage roll, a non-incorporeal model hit by Thunder Strike is slammed d6 directly away from the spell's point of origin and suffers a POW 14 damage roll. Collateral damage from this slam is POW 14.

characterabilities.name: Flames in the Darkness
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in a Religion of the Twins army. If it is, it becomes a Religion of the Twins model and not a [Cygnar] model. If included in a Religion of the Twins army, you may include up to 2 Cygnar or Khador Non-Character warjacks in this model's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Overload
characterabilities.description: Once per activation, you can roll one to three dice. This model gains a bonus to melee attacks equal to the total of that roll. Then roll the same dice again. This model suffers damage equal to the total of that roll. This model cannot spend a focus point to reduce this damage. This bonus expires at the end of the model's activation. (In execution mode, this model is able to take lethal damage from this ability.)

feat.name: Rolling Thunder
feat.description: After all friendly models have completed their activation this turn, friendly Faction models/units currently in Lord Commander Stryker's Control range can advance up to 3" and the can make one basic melee attack. When resolving these attacks, affected models can spend focus points to boost one accuracy or damage roll for each focus spent.

execution.name: Quick Work
execution.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during it's Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved, it can make one basic ranged attack.

spells.name: Deceleration
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly faction models gain +2 ARM against ranged and magic attack damage rolls. Deceleration lasts for one round.

spells.name: Lightning Storm
spells.description: Models hit suffer a POW 10 electrical damage roll. This spell's AOE is a hazard that remains in play for one round. Models entering or ending their activations in the AOE suffer a POW 10 electrical damage roll.

spells.name: Positive Charge
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warjack gains +2 to melee attack and melee damage rolls. While within 3" of the affected warjack, friendly Faction non-warjack models gain +2 on melee attack and melee damage rolls. Positive Charge lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Rebuke
spells.description: Target model/unit cannot give orders, receive orders, or make power attacks or special attacks.

spells.name: Velocity
spells.description: The spellcaster can spend up to 3 focus points to immediately advance up to 2" for each focus point spent. Velocity can be cast only once per activation.

characterabilities.name: Flames in the Darkness
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in a Religion of the Twins army. If it is, it becomes a Religion of the Twins model and not a [Cygnar] model. If included in a Religion of the Twins army, you may include up to 2 Cygnar or Khador Non-Character warjacks in this model's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Plasma Nimbus
characterabilities.description: If this model is hit by a melee attack, immediately after the attack is resolved you can choose to have the attacking model suffer a POW 10 Electric damage roll unless this model was destroyed or removed from play by the attack.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [3"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.

feat.name: Lightning Charge
feat.description: When a friendly Faction model makes a power attack, charge or impact attack while in Lord General Coleman Stryker's Control range, the attack automatically hits and gains an additional die on the damage roll. Lightning Charge lasts for one round.

execution.name: Tactician [Storm Knight and Storm Legion Models with Cavalry]
execution.description: While in this model's CMD range, friendly Storm Knight and Storm Legion Models with Cavalry models can ignore other friendly Storm Knight and Storm Legion Models with Cavalry models when determining LOS. Friendly Storm Knight and Storm Legion Models with Cavalry models can advance through other friendly Storm Knight and Storm Legion Models with Cavalry models in this model's CMD range if they have enough movement to move completely past them.

spells.name: Deceleration
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly faction models gain +2 ARM against ranged and magic attack damage rolls. Deceleration lasts for one round.

spells.name: Fury
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +3 to melee damage rolls but suffers -1 DEF.

spells.name: Iron Aggression
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warjack in the spellcaster's battle group can run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks without spending focus and gains boosted melee attack rolls.

characterabilities.name: Blood-Quenched
characterabilities.description: This model gains a cumulative +1 ARM and +1 to its melee damage rolls for each enemy model it destroys with a melee attack during its activation. This bonus lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Sidestep
characterabilities.description: When this model hits an enemy model with an initial melee attack or a melee special attack, it can advance up to 2" after the attack is resolved.

characterabilities.name: Spell Rack [2]
characterabilities.description: During list construction this model may select a number of spells from its faction spell pool according to its designated spell rack number. This model gains these spells in addition to the spells that are already on its card. A model may not have two identical spells on its spell card. When making spell selections from the spell pool deduct the spells COST from this model's available Battlegroup Points unless the spell entry lists another cost.

feat.name: Give 'em Hell!
feat.description: When one or moe friendly Faction models are destroyed while in Wolfe's Control area by an enemy attack, immediately after the attack is resolved one model in Wolfe's battlegroup currently in his Control area can advance up to 2" and make one basic attack. Give ‘Em Hell! Lasts for one round.

execution.name: Gang
execution.description: When making a melee attack targeting an enemy model in the melee range of another model in this model's battlegroup, this model gains +2 to melee attack accuracy and melee damage rolls.

ability.name: Electro Leap
ability.description: When a model is hit by a basic attack made with this weapon, you can have lightning arc to the nearest model within 4" of the model hit, ignoring the attacking model and any model with Resistance: Electric. The model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 Electric damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that caused the leap.

ability.name: Beat Back
ability.description: Immediately after a basic attack with a weapon with Beat Back is resolved during this model's Combat Action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1" directly toward it.

ability.name: Critical Thunderclap
ability.description: On a critical hit, models his without Resistance: Electric become knocked down.

spells.name: Energizer
spells.description: Each model in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is currently in its Control Range can immediately advance up to 2". Energizer can be cast only once per activation.

spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Resistance: Electricity. Affected models' melee weapons become RNG 2 and gain Electro Leap. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spells.name: Positive Charge
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warjack gains +2 to melee attack and melee damage rolls. While within 3" of the affected warjack, friendly Faction non-warjack models gain +2 on melee attack and melee damage rolls. Positive Charge lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Flames in the Darkness
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in a Religion of the Twins army. If it is, it becomes a Religion of the Twins model and not a [Cygnar] model. characterabilities.description: When this model makes a melee attack against an enemy model in the melee range of a friendly Storm Knight model, this model gains +2 to attack rolls and gains an additional damage die.

characterabilities.name: Quick Work
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during it's Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved, it can make one basic ranged attack.

characterabilities.description: This model can upkeep spells on models in it's battlegroup without spending focus or fury.

feat.description: While in Maddox's Control range, friendly faction model's melee weapons gain +3 POW and Beat Back. Thundering Rage lasts for one turn. (Beat Back - Immediately after a basic attack with a weapon with Beat Back is resolved during this model's Combat Action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1" directly toward it.)

execution.name: Hero of the People
execution.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during its unit's activation, other friendly warrior models gain +2 to their accuracy rolls while in this model's CMD range. Hero of the People lasts for one turn.

ability.name: Critical Disruption
ability.description: On a critical hit on a warjack, the warjack suffers Disruption, A warjack suffering Disruption loses its focus points and cannot channel spells or gains focus by any means, including by being allocated focus, for one round.

ability.name: Electro Leap
ability.description: When a model is hit by a basic attack made with this weapon, you can have lightning arc to the nearest model within 4" of the model hit, ignoring the attacking model and any model with Resistance: Electric. The model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 Electric damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that caused the leap.

ability.name: Critical Cortex Damage
ability.description: On a critical hit on a warjack, the warjack suffers 1 damage point to its first available cortex system box.

spells.name: Assail
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warjack can charge or make slam or trample power attacks without spending focus. The warjack gains +2" movement when it charges or makes a slam or trample power attack. Models slammed by the warjack are moved +2".

spells.name: Dauntless Resolve
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +3 ARM and Tough.

spells.name: Electrical Blast

spells.name: Onslaught
spells.description: The spellcaster and friendly Faction models beginning their activations in its Control Range gain Relentless Charge for one turn. (While advancing as part of a charge, a model with Relentless Charge gains Pathfinder.

spells.name: Snipe
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model's/unit's non spray ranged weapons gain +4 RNG.

spells.name: Solid Ground
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range friendly Faction models cannot become knocked down or be pushed and gain Resistance: Blast. (A model with Blast Resistance suffers one fewer die from blast damage rolls.).

characterabilities.name: Combat Engineer

feat.name: Breach

execution.name: Destroyer Of Walls

ability.name: Ground Pounder (★Attack)
ability.description: Place a 4" AOE anywhere completely within this weapon's RNG in this model's LOS. This model makes one ranged attack roll against each model in the AOE, ignoring concealment, Cover, Stealth and Elevation. This model does not gain a bonus for aiming when resolving a Ground Pounder attack. Models do not gain the target in melee DEF bonus when resolving Ground Pounder attack rolls. Models hit suffer a ranged attack damage roll with a POW equal to the POW of this weapon. Ground Pounder attacks are simultaneous.

ability.name: Critical Smite
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit can be slammed d6" directly away from this model. If the model hit has a larger base than the attacking model, it is moved only half the distance rolled. The POW of collateral damage is equal to the STR of this model.

If the affected model directly hits and boxes an enemy model with an attack from a ranged weapon, center a 3" AOE on the boxed model, then remove that model from play. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer an unboostable POW 10 magical blast damage roll.

spells.name: Force Hammer
spells.description: Instead of suffering a normal damage roll, a non-Incorporeal model Force Hammer hits is slammed d6" directly away from the spell's point of origin and suffers a POW 12 damage roll. Collateral damage from this slam is POW 12.

spells.name: Foxhole
spells.description: Place a 5" AOE anywhere completely within the spellcaster's Control Range where it does not touch a model's base, an obstruction or an obstacle. Models completely within the AOE have cover and do not suffer blast damage. When drawing LOS to the model not completely within the AOE, ignore intervening models completely within the AOE.

spells.name: Mage Sight
spells.description: Place a 5" AOE completely within the spellcaster's Control Range. While a model is within the AOE, models in the spellcaster's battlegroup ignore forests and cloud effects when drawing LOS to it and ignore Stealth when attacking it.

spells.name: Rift
spells.description: The AoE is rough terrain and remains in play for one round. While within the AoE models lose and cannot gain pathfinder.

characterabilities.name: Reiteration

characterabilities.name: Set Defense
characterabilities.description: A model in this model's front arc suffers -2 on charge, slam power attack, and impact attack accuracy rolls against this model.

characterabilities.name: Time Walker

Place that model completely within 2" of Haley Prime. The placed model enters play with a number of focus equal to its ARC and cannot activate this turn. After this model replenishes its focus during your Control Phase, it can spend 2 focus each to keep Haley Past and/or Haley Future in play. If it does not, that model is removed from the table.

feat.name: Arcane Singularity
feat.description: Major Prime Victoria Haley gains +2 ARC and +2 AAT for one turn and immediately gains 2 Focus Points. If Haley Past and/or Haley Future is in play and in Major Prime Victoria Haley’s Control range, they gain +2 ARC and +2 AAT for one turn and immediately gain 2 Focus Points.

execution.name: Great Power
execution.description: During your Control Phase, this model can upkeep one spell without spending focus, fury or essence.

The enemy warjack cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement. Domination can be cast only once per activation. A warjack can be affected by Domination only once per turn.

spells.name: Repudiate
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Repudiate immediately expires. When an upkeep spell expires as a result of Repudiate, the model maintaining the spell suffers d3 damage points.

spells.name: Tactical Supremacy
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Reposition [3"]. (At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, a model with Reposition [3"] can advance up to 3", then its activation ends.).

spells.name: Temporal Distortion
spells.description: Models in this unit gain +2 DEF. While within 5" of a model in this unit friendly Faction models gain +2 DEF and enemy models suffer -2 DEF. Temporal Distortion lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Companion [Major Prime Victoria Haley]
characterabilities.description: This model is included in any army that includes Major Prime Victoria Haley. If Major Prime Victoria Haley is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Major Prime Victoria Haley's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Created
characterabilities.description: This model does not begin the game in play.

characterabilities.name: Gift of Mage Sight

characterabilities.name: Time Projection

During your Control Phase, this model can allocate focus to warjacks in it's Control Range that are in Haley Prime's battlegroup. This model can channel spells through warjacks in Haley Prime's battlegroup that have the Arc Node advantage and are in this model's Control Range.

ability.name: Reload [2]
ability.description: This model can spend up to 2 focus, fury, or essensce to make one additional ranged attack with this weapon during its Combat Action per focus, fury, or essence spent.

spells.name: Ghost Walk
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Ghostly for one turn. (A model with Ghostly can advance through terrain and obstacles without penalty and can advance through obstructions if it has enough movement to move completely past them. It cannot be targeted by free strikes).

spells.name: Revive

Place the returned Grunt in the spellcaster's Control Range, in formation, and completely within 3" of another model in its unit. The Grunt must forfeit its Combat Action the turn it is put into play.

feat.description: Choose 8 enemy models currently in Haley's Control range. Chosen models must forfeit either their Normal Movement or Combat Action during their next activations. Temporal Shift lasts for one round.

execution.name: Iron Sentinel
execution.description: While B2B with a friendly Faction warjack, this model gains +2 DEF and ARM and cannot become knocked down.

spells.name: Arcane Bolt
spells.description: Magical bolts of energy streak toward the target model.

(A model with Blast Resistance suffers one fewer die from blast damage rolls.).

spells.description: Target friendly Faction model gains +2" movement when advancing as part of its Normal Movement and can make one additional ranged or melee attack during its activation regardless of rate of fire. spells.description: A model directly hit by Time Bomb suffers -2 SPD and DEF for one round.

characterabilities.name: Alternative History

characterabilities.name: Aura Of Empowerment
characterabilities.description: When a friendly Faction warjack begins its activation in this model's CMD range, that warjack gains 1 focus point.

characterabilities.name: Desperate Pace [Cygnar] (★Action)

characterabilities.name: Founder of the Inquisition

characterabilities.name: Parry

If this model's melee attack hits, the enemy model suffers no damage but it's attack automatically misses.

characterabilities.name: Power Of The Grim King

This model can have up to three power tokens at any time. During its Combat Action, this model can spend power tokens to make additional melee attacks or to boost accuracy or damage rolls for each token spent.

characterabilities.description: When a model misses this model with a charge or power attack, the attacking model becomes knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Sacrificial Pawn [Cygnar]

That model is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. The Sacrificial Pawn special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.

characterabilities.name: The Greatest Duelist

subabilities.name: Ward Breaker

ability.description: On a direct hit against an enemy model, all models hit are knocked down.

The model with Retaliatory Strike can make only one Retaliatory Strike per turn.)

ability.description: When this model makes a Surge special attack, select another friendly Stormsmith Stormcaller within 20" of it. If at the time this model makes this special attack it and the other two Stormsmiths are within 20" of each other, this model can target up to three models whose bases are within the triangular area between all three Stormsmiths. This model then makes a Storm Strike attack against each model targeted, ignoring the RNG of this weapon. Models can be targeted only once per Triangulation special attack. If this model and the chosen models are not all within 20" of each other when this model makes this special attack, nothing happens.

characterabilities.name: Journeyman Warcaster
characterabilities.description: This model is not a warcaster or Leader, but has the following warcaster special rules: Battlegroup Controller, Focus Manipulation, Power Field, and Spellcaster. This model must have at least one warjack in its battlegroup at the start of the game.

characterabilities.name: Smoke Bomb
characterabilities.description: Centre a 3" AOE cloud effect on this model. This AOE remains in play for one round.

ability.name: Brutal Charge
ability.description: This model gains +2 to charge attack damage rolls with this weapon.

spells.name: Fire Group
spells.description: While models in the spellcaster's battlegroup are in its Control Range, their ranged weapons gain +2 RNG. Fire Group lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Rift
spells.description: The AoE is rough terrain and remains in play for one round. While within the AoE models lose and cannot gain pathfinder.

characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 DEF against ranged accuracy attack rolls and Resistance: Blast.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Electrocutioner
subabilities.description: A model directly hit by this attack suffers a cumulative -1 DEF for one turn unless it has Resistance: Electricity. When a model without Resistance: Electricity is directly hit with three or more Electrocutioner attacks in the same turn, it becomes stationary for one round.

subabilities.name: Sky Rumbler
subabilities.description: On a direct hit, the model hit and models within 5” of it lose Flight for one round.

subabilities.name: Thunderbolt
subabilities.description: Enemy models hit are pushed d3" directly away from the attacking model. On a critical hit, the enemy model becomes knocked down after being pushed.

characterabilities.name: Ionization [10"]
characterabilities.description: When a model without Resistance: Electric suffers an Electric damage roll while within 10" of this model, add +2 to the roll.

characterabilities.name: Repairable
characterabilities.description: This model can be targeted with Repair special actions as if it were a construct model.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [3"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.

ability.name: Arcing Fire
ability.description: When attacking with this weapon, this model can ignore intervening models except those within 1" of the target.

ability.name: Electro Leap
ability.description: When a model is hit by a basic attack made with this weapon, you can have lightning arc to the nearest model within 4" of the model hit, ignoring the attacking model and any model with Resistance: Electric. The model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 Electric damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that caused the leap.

characterabilities.description: During your Maintenance Phase, return d3 small or medium based friendly destroyed Trencher Grunts to play. Models return with 1 unmarked damage box. Place the returned Grunts completely within this model's CMD range, in formation and completely within 3” of another model in their unit. Returned Grunts must forfeit their combat actions the turn they are returned to play.

characterabilities.name: Strategic Importance
characterabilities.description: Friendly Trencher models in this model's Command range gain +1 to attack rolls.

characterabilities.name: Trench Network
characterabilities.description: Immediately after placing this model during deployment, you can place up to two trench templates on the table. These trench terrain features must be placed either in base contact with this model or in contact with a trench terrain feature that is in base contact with this model. These trench terrain features cannot be placed in contact with a non-trench terrain feature.

ability.name: High-Explosive

ability.name: Quake

characterabilities.name: Alchemical Mask
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

characterabilities.name: Arms Caddy
characterabilities.description: Once per turn at any time during its activation and while within 5" of Mr. Clogg, Gearhart can use Arms Caddy. Replace his ranged weapon with one of the weapons on Mr. Clogg's card. Gearhart keeps that weapon until he uses Arms Caddy again.

characterabilities.name: Paid Loyalties [Cygnar] [Crucible Guard]

characterabilities.name: Veteran Leader [Faction warrior]

feat.name: Fox Hunt

A model gains +2 to accuracy and damage rolls against its prey. When the prey is destroyed or removed from play, choose another model/unit in Gearhart’s Control range to be the prey. Fox Hunt lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Prowl

When making spell selections from the spell pool deduct the spells COST from this model's available Battlegroup Points unless the spell entry lists another cost.

feat.description: Sparkhammer gains the benefit of all his Arcane Machinery effects this activation. Additionally, while in Sparkhammer's Control range, friendly models can reroll Stormcall accuracy and damage rolls. Each roll can be rerolled only once due to Cloud Burst. Cloud Burst lasts for one turn.

ability.description: Immediately after a basic attack with a weapon with Beat Back is resolved during this model's Combat Action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1" directly toward it.

ability.name: Lightning Generator
ability.description: When a model is directly hit with a basic attack made with this weapon, lightning arcs from the model hit to d3 consecutive additional models unless that model has Resistance: Electric. The lightning arcs to the nearest model it has not already arced to within 4" of the last model it arced to ignoring this model and models with Resistance: Electric. Each model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 Electric damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that cause the lighting to arc.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Death Driver
subabilities.description: When this weapon boxes a living or undead non-warcaster, non-warlock enemy warrior model, you can immediately take Control of the enemy model and make a full advance with it followed by a basic melee attack, then the boxed model is removed from play. The boxed model cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

subabilities.name: Eruption Of Ash
subabilities.description: If a model is boxed by an attack made with this weapon, center a 3" AOE cloud effect on the boxed model and then remove that model from play. The AOE is a hazard that remains in play for one round. Enemy models in the AOE when it was put in play are hit and suffer a POW 12 fire damage roll. Enemy models entering or ending their activations in the AOE suffer a POW 12 fire damage roll. Eruption of Ash damage rolls cannot be boosted.

subabilities.name: Thamar's Teeth
subabilities.description: When this weapon hits a model with soul tokens, the damage roll for this attack is boosted. After resolving an attack with this weapon, remove all soul tokens from models it hits.

characterabilities.name: Reinforcements [Rhulic]
characterabilities.description: During your Maintenance Phase, return d3 small or medium based friendly destroyed Rhulic Grunts to play. Models return with 1 unmarked damage box. Place the returned Grunts completely within this model's CMD range, in formation and completely within 3” of another model in their unit. Returned Grunts must forfeit their combat actions the turn they are returned to play.

characterabilities.name: Roadblock
characterabilities.description: This model provides cover to friendly models as if it were an obstacle. This model loses Roadblock while it is incorporeal or knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Khador, Llael, Ord, Searforge Commission]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Crucible Guard, Cygnar, Khador, Llael, Ord, Searforge Commission.

ability.name: Critical Stagger
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit loses its inital attacks and cannot make power attacks or special attacks for one round.

ability.name: Siege Weapon
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die to its damage rolls against huge-based models and structures.

ability.name: Critical Stagger
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit loses its inital attacks and cannot make power attacks or special attacks for one round.

ability.name: Siege Weapon
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die to its damage rolls against huge-based models and structures.

characterabilities.name: Auto-Repair
characterabilities.description: During your Control Phase, remove d3 damage points from this model.

characterabilities.name: Evasive
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by free strikes. This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy ranged attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing.

characterabilities.name: Flying High
characterabilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

characterabilities.name: Gun Platform
characterabilities.description: This model can make ranged attacks even while in melee and can target models outside of melee.

characterabilities.name: Propelled [12]
characterabilities.description: This model cannot run, aim, charge, or become knocked down. This model can advance up to 12” total during its Normal Movement. If this model advances less than 12” during its Normal Movement, it can advance its remaining movement at the end of its activation.

characterabilities.name: Shooting Gallery
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 to Ranged accuracy rolls against models within 5” of it.

ability.name: Crater
ability.description: On a direct hit, models hit suffer -2 SPD for one round.

ability.name: Critical Devastation
ability.description: On a critical hit, models hit are thrown d6" directly away from the attacker. Roll distance once for all models affected. Move models farthest from the attacker first. Instead of suffering blast damage, models hit but not directly hit suffer a damage roll with POW of collateral damage is equal to the blast damage POW of this weapon.

ability.name: Siege Weapon
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die to its damage rolls against huge-based models and structures.

ability.name: Sky-Dropped
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon ignore cover. Models with Flight do not suffer blast damage from this attack.

characterabilities.name: Sky Ladder
characterabilities.description: When this model ends it's Normal Movement, choose one small or medium-based friendly solo model within 2” of it. You can place the chosen model completely within 2” of its current location. A model can be placed as a result of Sky Ladder only once per turn.

characterabilities.name: Bottom Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The lower level of this structure is considered to be concealing terrain.

characterabilities.name: Catastrophic Collapse
characterabilities.description: When this model is destroyed or removed from play, all models inside of it immediately suffer 10 damage. This damage is simultaneous and not considered to have resulted from an attack. Replace this model with all surviving models that were inside of it when it was destroyed.

characterabilities.name: Forward Deployment
characterabilities.description: This model can be deployed up to 8” beyond your deployment zone.

characterabilities.name: Habitable [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Small and medium-based units and solos can enter this structure through a door on the lower level. A model/unit ending its Normal Movement within 1” of the door can choose to enter this building. Models entering this building can be placed on either the lower or upper levels. Models in a unit occupying this structure can be placed on either floor or both. There can be up to six small-based models or three medium-based models on each floor. There must be room for a model's base for it to be placed on either floor.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [any army]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for any army.

characterabilities.name: Movement Inside [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Models/units can use their Normal Movement to be placed on the top floor if they were previously on the lower floor or to be placed on the lower floor if they were on the top floor. Units using their Normal Movement to be placed are considered to have moved. Models cannot otherwise move, warp, or be placed while inside the building.

characterabilities.name: Top Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The upper level of this structure is considered to be elevated terrain. Additionally, models on the Top Floor gain Snipe. Spells cast from the Top Floor gain +4 RNG.

Units using their Normal Movement to be placed are considered to have moved. Models cannot otherwise move, warp, or be placed while inside the building.
